full_text: DPS Tal Fi rena Petsise Be re ares 2014/KER/224 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT: THE HONOURABLE MR.JUSTICE HARUN-UL-RASHID THURSDAY, THE 2ND DAY OF JANUARY 2014/12TH POUSHA, 1935 Cr1.MC.No. 43 of 2014 () (CMP 7810/2013 OF JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE COURT-1, KASARAGOD CRIME NO.730/2013 OF BADIADUKKA POLICE STATION, KASARGOD) PETITIONERS /ACCUSED: 1. K.GURUVAYURAPPA, AGED 32 YEARS S/O.VENKTRAMANA BHAT, RESIDING AT BENAKA NILAYA KONDOLU MOOLE, HAUDODI, POST-MELANTHABETTU-574214 BELTHANGADI TALUK, D.K.DISTRICT, KARNATAKA. 2. VENKTRAMANA BHAT, AGED 68 YEARS S/O. LATE GOPALAKRISHNA BHAT RESIDING AT BENAKA NILAYA, KONDOLU MOOLE, HAUDODI POST-MELANTHABETTU-574214, BELTHANGADI TALUK D.K.DISTRICT, KARNATAKA. 3. VENKATESHWARI, AGED 61 YEARS W/O. VENKTRAMANA BHAT, RESIDING AT BENAKA NILAYA KONDOLU MOOLE, HAUDODI, POST-MELANTHABETTU-574214 BELTHANGADI TALUK, D.K.DISTRICT, KARNATAKA. BY ADVS.SRI.M.RAMESH CHANDER (SR.) SRI.ANEESH JOSEPH RESPONDENTS/COMPLAINANT AND STATE: 1. SREELEELA, AGED 27 YEARS D/O. RAMACHANDRA BHAT, W/O. K.GURUVAYURAPPA RESIDING AT BANPUTHADKA HOUSE, POST-UKKINADKA BADTADKA VILLAGE, KASARAGOD TALUK AND DISTRICT. 2. STATE OF KERALA REPRESENTED BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR HIGH COURT OF KERALA, KOCHI-31. R1 BY ADV. SMT.DENNIS VARGHESE R BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR SMT. SAREENA GEORGE THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 02-01-2014, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Bh Fi rena Resp Be Blears 2014/KER/224 Cr1l.MC.No. 43 of 2014 () APPENDIX PETITIONER(S)' EXHIBITS ANNEXURE Al- TRUE COPY OF THE CMP 7810/2013 ON THE FILE OF THE JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE OF FIRST CLASS-I, KASARGOD FILED BY 18ST RESPONDENT DATED 17-12-2013. ANNEXURE A2- PHOTOSTAT COPY OF THE AGREEMENT ENTERED BETWEEN THE PETITIONERS HEREIN AND THE FIRST RESPONDENT ON 31-12-2013. ANNEXURE A3- THE ORIGINAL OF THE AFFIDAVIT OF THE 1ST RESPONDENT STATING THAT THE MATTER HAS BEEN SETTLED BETWEEN THE PRTIES. RESPONDENT (S)' EXHIBITS: NIL TRUE COPY PA TO JUDGE SCL. eee 2014/KER/224 HARUN-UL-RASHID, J. Crl.M.C No.43 of 2014 Dated this the 2" day of January, 2014. ORDER Heard the learned counsel for the petitioners and respondents. 2. Accused in Crime No.730/2013 of Badiadka Police Station, pending as C.M.P.No.7810 of 2013 on the file of the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court-I, Kasaragod are the petitioners. The petition is filed seeking to quash further proceedings against the petitioners in C.M.P.No.7810 of 2013 on the file of the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court-I, Kasaragod. 3. The offence alleged is punishable under Section 498 A IPC. 4. The learned counsel on both sides submit that the disputes between the parties have been amicably settled and having regard to the resolution of the disputes between the parties, continuance of the criminal prosecution against the petitioners is an avoidable irritant. In view of the settlement arrived at between the parties, the Crl.M.C is disposed of quashing all further proceedings in C.M.P.No.7810 of 2013 on the file of the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court-I, Kasaragod. HARUN-UL-RASHID, Judge. scl.
